meanings.definition: A sheet of paper folded to form a page of a book.
meanings.sent1: I found a hidden message in one of the flysheets of the old book.
meanings.sent2: The library had many books with torn flysheets.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat used the flysheets as a makeshift tent.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts fluttered like loose flysheets in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The colorful illustrations on the flysheets captured my attention.

meanings.definition: A lightweight material used to cover a bed.
meanings.sent1: The hotel provided soft flysheets for a comfortable sleep.
meanings.sent2: She chose a floral-patterned flysheet to match her room decor.
meanings.sent3: The flysheet floated like a cloud when hung out to dry.
meanings.sent4: The flysheet draped elegantly over the bed, adding a touch of luxury.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze lifted the flysheet, creating a soothing rustling sound.
